<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A GC strategy for uncooperative targets.  This implements lowering for the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// llvm.gc&#42; intrinsics for targets that do not natively support them (which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">/// includes the C backend). Note that the code generated is not quite as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">/// efficient as algorithms which generate stack maps to identify roots.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In order to support this particular transformation, all stack roots are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// coallocated in the stack. This allows a fully target-independent stack map</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">/// while introducing only minor runtime overhead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/shadowstackgc"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/shadowstackgc/#a8025e65721f637e779cc6f8fdaa7a0fc">ShadowStackGC</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#abc5b7efa0f9360dac6bbd35ab553cb0d">GCStrategy</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/shadowstackgc/#a8025e65721f637e779cc6f8fdaa7a0fc"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/shadowstackgc/#a8025e65721f637e779cc6f8fdaa7a0fc">ShadowStackGC</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A GCStrategy which serves as an example for the usage of a statepoint based</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">/// lowering strategy.  This GCStrategy is intended to suitable as a default</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">/// implementation usable with any collector which can consume the standard</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">/// stackmap format generated by statepoints, uses the default addrespace to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">/// distinguish between gc managed and non-gc managed pointers, and has</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// reasonable relocation semantics.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/statepointgc"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/statepointgc/#ad783af64abf7eede187e42abfcbd4f22">StatepointGC</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#abc5b7efa0f9360dac6bbd35ab553cb0d">GCStrategy</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#a32c75ebeabf283b9a98b1b5641a2885e">UseRS4GC</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These options are all gc.root specific, we specify them so that the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// gc.root lowering code doesn&#39;t run.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Method is only valid on pointer typed values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype">PointerType</a> &#42;PT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(Ty);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the sake of this example GC, we arbitrarily pick addrspace(1) as our</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// GC managed heap.  We know that a pointer into this heap needs to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// updated and that no other pointer does.  Note that addrspace(1) is used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// only as an example, it has no special meaning, and is not reserved for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// GC usage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (1 == PT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype/#af8aeced5e71d2589fa3e9791043af5cb">getAddressSpace</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A GCStrategy for the CoreCLR Runtime. The strategy is similar to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Statepoint-example GC, but differs from it in certain aspects, such as:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1) Base-pointers need not be explicitly tracked and reported for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">///    interior pointers</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2) Uses a different format for encoding stack-maps</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3) Location of Safe-point polls: polls are only needed before loop-back</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">///    edges and before tail-calls (not needed at function-entry)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The above differences in behavior are to be implemented in upcoming</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// checkins.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#ad855caa394ad8edf75f93cbd521dee22">CoreCLRGC</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#abc5b7efa0f9360dac6bbd35ab553cb0d">GCStrategy</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#ad855caa394ad8edf75f93cbd521dee22"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#ad855caa394ad8edf75f93cbd521dee22">CoreCLRGC</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#a6d4b88865bc96bd6a93c3076e210af61">UseStatepoints</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#a32c75ebeabf283b9a98b1b5641a2885e">UseRS4GC</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These options are all gc.root specific, we specify them so that the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// gc.root lowering code doesn&#39;t run.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#a876df2ee9b43a6e37c7e25cdbc5ee458">NeededSafePoints</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#a5d53780e41b87b0b8cb0e4a822f38281">UsesMetadata</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#a7b5844a0f3f8ef4d67cd6603f7ab3e49"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#a7b5844a0f3f8ef4d67cd6603f7ab3e49">isGCManagedPointer</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const override </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Method is only valid on pointer typed values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype">PointerType</a> &#42;PT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(Ty);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We pick addrspace(1) as our GC managed heap.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (1 == PT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype/#af8aeced5e71d2589fa3e9791043af5cb">getAddressSpace</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end anonymous namespace</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Register all the above so that they can be found at runtime.  Note that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// these static initializers are important since the registration list is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constructed from their storage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GCRegistry::Add&lt;ErlangGC&gt; <a href="#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;erlang&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;erlang-compatible garbage collector&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
